name: Chronboy
description:
You will play as Chronboy, a young wizard that are capable of PAUSING time, and Rewinding time(Restart game). Use this ability to avoid deadly obstacle and to STEAL gold that are scattered in the dungeon.

Contol:
Press Esc to open menu

Credit:
UI Buttons - Kicked-in-Teeth
Sound Effect - harvey656 and Labbed
Tileset(Kings and Pigs) - Pixel Frog
Fonts(HumbleFonts) - Eeve Somepx
BGM (ArcadeGameBGM#3) - B.G.M(Unity Asset Store)

Hey guys thank you for playing this game! Big thank you for ZahranW for hosting this awesome game jam.

I am a beginner on game developing, this is my second game jam, so any feedbacks is much appreciated.  Once again thank you for playing this game!
